original: Burman, Oscar Vilhelm, kyrkoherde, Räppe, f. 6/4/90 i Almundsryd, Kronob. 1., av Vilhelm B. o. Matilda Jönsson. G. 26 m. Lilly Arvidsson. Barn: Eskil f. 28, Margareta 30, Anders 32. –Stud:ex. i Växjö 09, teol fil ex. i Lund 10, teol kand., prakt, teol prov .samt präsitv. f Växjö istift 15. Tjg. som v. pastor i Skärstad, kommin. i Asa o. kyrkoh. på Visingsö, kyrkoh. i Berg-unda ised. 42, tf. kontr :prD’S’t i Vi’s>tra kontr. 41.
translated:
Burman, Oscar Vilhelm, priest, Räppe, born on April 6th, 1890 in Almundsryd, Kronoberg county, son of Vilhelm B. and Matilda Jönsson. Married on March 26th, 19xx to Lilly Arvidsson. Children: Eskil born in 1928, Margareta born in 1930, Anders born in 1932. 

Education: Completed high school in Växjö in 1909, theology and philosophy degree in Lund in 1910, ordained as a priest and passed practical theology examination in Växjö diocese in 1915. Worked as deputy pastor in Skärstad, curate in Asa, priest in Visingsö, and priest in Berg-unda starting in 1942. Acting district dean in Västra kontraktet in 1941.

education.name: Ordained as Priest, Practical Theology Examination
